Description:
Position Title:             FloristEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                         2K EUR all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications plus paid overtimeJob Location:            Qormi, Malta About the Client:A well-known Garden Center and Flower Shop based in Malta, Europe (a tourist spot island beside Italy). Job Description:  Apply professional flower handling techniques as per customer requests, apply beautiful combinations and provide occasion-specific flower suggestions.
Receive shipments and then snipping and displaying flowers.
Top up watering solutions to enhance flowers' life spans.
Carefully arrange palatable bouquets for purchase
Coordinate all regional flower deliveriesSkills
Skills:
Open to Filipino and Nepali nationals
45 years old and below
At least 2 years solid UAE experience on the same role within the same industry
Knowledgeable about flower handling techniques
Ability to nourish, combine, and affix flowers and pertinent accessories
Excellent verbal communication skills
